title: How come i got demoted after i won a game
body: this window popped up while i was in game saying that i got demoted due to inactivity even tho i play ranked every day.

replies.body: The best thing you can do in a case like this is submit a [Player Support ticket.](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) They'll be able to help you out!
yeah if they would ever respond to it..
I thought inactivity didn't even cause demotions anymore in Silver?

> I thought inactivity didn't even cause demotions anymore in Silver?

As far as I know it's not supposed to happen in Silver or Gold for the remainder of the season, so I'm guessing it's just a bug.
Why don;t people read? it says you were demoted to silver 4 from silver 4 to inactivity. it's a known bug

You did not get demoted after a win, you most likely got demoted and got that notification but hadn't deleted it.
It shows when you drop a division for some reason.

Wait this happened to me 2 days ago. It said inactivity caused me to drop from Gold V to silver 1. My mmr was low cuz i hadnt been doing great so i thought i dropped cuz of that . Is this actually a bug cuz i play consistently?
You on the East Coast?  If so it's probable you weren't lagging enough and that upset the servers so they just straight up demoted you to compensate.
